pr_title: VS refactoring: convert Boxplot to new registry

timeline.message: Convert Boxplot to new VS registry

timeline.bodyText: @talevy showed me that in cases like this, we can use a lambda with a type cast.  Since BoxplotAggregator already just takes a ValuesSource directly (as opposed to needing a cast), I think we can just say (BoxplotAggregationSupplier) BoxplotAggregator::new here.  We'll also need to add the @FunctionalInterface annotation to BoxplotAggregationSupplier.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

timeline.message: Add missing HISTOGRAM supported VST, address review comments
